attributes.action: Remove Pakistan from the red list right now.
attributes.additional_details: A review with transparency on the factors which justify Pakistan being a red listed country when it poses a minimal risk to the UK Covid rates compared to others which are afforded a relaxed quarantine path into the UK.
attributes.background:
Ask the COVID team to explain the criteria which is being used to keep Pakistan on the red list.
The total cases, new cases, total & new death rates are a fraction of other countries that are amber such as India.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: 

Remove Pakistan from red list for travel
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581974
